009package _Testing;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterScalar;
017import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterScalarSeparable;
018import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterVector;
019import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterVectorSeparable;
020import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
021import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.LinearFilter;
022import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
023import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
024import imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ProgressMonitor;
025import imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ij.ProgressBarMonitor;
026
027/**
028 * This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a generic linear filter
029 * using the classes {@link LinearFilter} and {@link Kernel2D}.
030 * This plugin works for all types of images.
031 * 
032 * @author WB
033 *
034 */
035public class Filter_Show_Progress_Example implements PlugInFilter {
036        
037    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
038        return DOES_ALL;
039    }
040
041    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
042        //GenericFilter filter = new MyFilterScalar(); //new FilterShowProgressExample();
043        //GenericFilter filter = new MyFilterVector(); 
044        //GenericFilter filter = new MyFilterVectorSeparable();
045        GenericFilter filter = new MyFilterScalarSeparable();
046        
047        IJ.log("RUNNING " + filter.getClass().getSimpleName());
048        try (ProgressMonitor m = new ProgressBarMonitor(filter)) {
049                        filter.applyTo(ip);
050                        IJ.log(String.format("elapsed time: %.3fs", m.getElapsedTime()));
051                }
052                
053    }
054    
055    // ----------------------------------------------------------------
056    // ----------------------------------------------------------------
057    
058    static class MyFilterScalar extends GenericFilterScalar {
059        // variables for progress reporting
060        
061
062        @Override
063        protected float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v) {
064                dummyWork();
065                return plane.getVal(u, v);
066        }
067        
068        @Override
069        protected int passesRequired() {
070                return 2;
071        }
072
073    }
074    
075    // ------------------------------------------------------------------
076    
077    static class MyFilterVector extends GenericFilterVector {
078        // variables for progress reporting
079
080                @Override
081                protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack source, int u, int v) {
082                        dummyWork();
083                        return source.getVec(u, v);
084                }
085        
086        @Override
087        protected int passesRequired() {
088                return 2;
089        }
090    }
091    
092    // ------------------------------------------------------------------
093    
094    static class MyFilterVectorSeparable extends GenericFilterVectorSeparable {
095        // variables for progress reporting
096
097
098                @Override
099                protected float[] doPixelX(PixelPack source, int u, int v) {
100                        dummyWork();
101                        return source.getVec(u, v);
102                }
103
104                @Override
105                protected float[] doPixelY(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
106                        dummyWork();
107                        return pack.getVec(u, v);
108                }
109                
110                @Override
111                protected final int passesRequired() {
112                        return 1;       // do exactly 2 passes
113                }
114    }
115    
116 // ------------------------------------------------------------------
117    
118    static class MyFilterScalarSeparable extends GenericFilterScalarSeparable {
119        // variables for progress reporting
120
121
122                @Override
123                protected float doPixelX(PixelSlice source, int u, int v) {
124                        dummyWork();
125                        return source.getVal(u, v);
126                }
127
128                @Override
129                protected float doPixelY(PixelSlice pack, int u, int v) {
130                        dummyWork();
131                        return pack.getVal(u, v);
132                }
133                
134                @Override
135                protected final int passesRequired() {
136                        return 2;       // do exactly 2 passes
137                }
138    }
139    
140 // ------------------------------------------------------------------
141    
142    
143        private static float dummyWork() {
144                int maxCnt = 5000;
145        int cnt = 0;
146                float sum = 0;
147                for (int i = 0; i < maxCnt; i++) {
148                        cnt = i;
149                        sum += (float) Math.sqrt(i); // some dummy work
150                }
151                cnt = 0;
152                return sum;
153        }
154 
155
156}
